### W02D1-23G426 – Deceleration Bullet Trap Request for Proposal

**Reference Number:** WS4073599588-Doc4073713767
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-28
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-21T14:00:00
**Amendment Date:** 2023-07-12

This Request for Proposal solicits submissions for the supply, delivery, and installation of one Deceleration Bullet Trap in Richmond, British Columbia. The successful supplier will provide a system compliant with the requirements as outlined in this solicitation package.

**Key Requirements:**

* Supply, delivery, and installation of one Deceleration Bullet Trap
* System compliant with the requirements outlined in the solicitation package
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Project Schedule:**

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-07
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

**Contracting Entity Information:**

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5

**End User Entity Information:**

* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

**Contact Information:**

* Contact Person: Samantha Phelan (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:samantha.phelan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16719350?extsite=MTY3MTkzNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16719350?extsite=MTY3MTkzNTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Classification Information:**
---------------------------

* UNSPSC Code: 46101700
* UNSPSC Description: Ammunition handling systems

This request for proposal is open to Tenderers capable and qualified to provide the required goods and services. All interested Tender
